content.rendered:
Careers at Maple

Join a passionate team working to improve access to healthcare for all Canadians. Learn, grow, and make a positive impact.

Are you interested in becoming a healthcare provider on Maple? Click here.

See job openings

Anchored by a shared goal, our team is developing products that address inequities in healthcare, and serve diverse populations across Canada.

Maple lets people across Canada connect with doctors in minutes, and specialists within days. Seeing a doctor faster means feeling better faster.

Anchored by a shared goal, our team is developing products that address inequities in healthcare, and serve diverse populations across Canada.

Maple lets people across Canada connect with doctors in minutes, and specialists within days. Seeing a doctor faster means feeling better faster.

Health and wellness

We invest in your well-being so you can feel your best at work and home.

  • Extended health and dental benefits from day one.
  • Parental leave top-up.
  • Three weeks vacation to start, plus five paid emergency days.
  • Up to three online doctor’s appointments on Maple per year.
Career and self‑growth

Forge a fulfilling career at a rapidly-growing company.

  • Fuel your career growth by contributing to our one-of-a-kind product and mission.
  • Annual $600 learning budget.
  • Monthly lunch and learns.
Work with purpose

Our team members have the opportunity to actively give back to their communities.

  • Actively improve Canadians’ access to healthcare through your work.
  • Social responsibility central to our business mission.
Stand‑out culture

We want you to love working at Maple. Your role should feel like more than just a job.

  • Our close-knit team encourages and celebrates each other’s success.
  • Diversity, equity, and inclusion are core to how we do business.
  • Collective spirit around learning, growning, and improving together.

See our open positions
